title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin points out the rocky relationship Aaron Rodgers has with the Packers organization late in his career and why he is developing the same tendencies Brett Favre did at the end of his career. He discusses Ben Roethlisberger's career and why he never reached his full potential after he officially announced his retirement from the NFL. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to break down film to describe what makes Matthew Stafford and the Rams offense special. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
